name: BackwardsBeat2
description:
**Play Full screen**

-Use the mouse to allign the VHS reals with the incoming notes. Click the mouse with correct timing to play the note.

-The red arrow follows the mouse, and the blue arrow mimics the red arrow.

-Successfully time a note to rewind the movie.

-If you miss a note the movie will temporarily cease to rewind.

-Completely rewind the movie by the end of the song to win.

-Tip: Keep the mouse close to the red arrow for most responsive controls.

Credits:

Mark Porter-Developer
